HTMLOptionsCollectionLength.summary: The length property of the interface returns the number of {{htmlelement("option")}} elements in the collection. The property can get or set the size of the collection.

remarks.para: When setting length to a value smaller than the current, the options collection gets truncated; otherwise, new blank <option> elements are appended to the end of the <select>.

HTMLOptionsCollectionLength.value: An integer value representing the number of items in this HTMLOptionsCollection.
